DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study assess clinical effect natalizumab versus placebo acute ischemic stroke clinical measure functional independence activity daily live . The secondary objective study explore dose exposure response clinical treatment effect natalizumab versus placebo acute ischemic stroke follow : measure independence , activity daily live , neurologic function , quality life , cognition , safety tolerability
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Intravenous Natalizumab Acute Ischemic Stroke
DOC.criteria: Key Clinical diagnosis supratentorial acute ischemic stroke define LKN ≤24 hour prior study treatment initiation . Score 5 23 point , inclusive , NIHSS Screening subject initiate treatment ≤9 hour LKN . Note : NIHSS eligibility must confirm within 60 minute prior randomization . Score 5 15 point , inclusive , NIHSS Screening subject initiate treatment > 9 ≤24 hour LKN . Note : NIHSS eligibility must confirm within 60 minute prior randomization . Prior index stroke , patient able perform basic activity daily live without assistance : dressing , eat , walk , bathing , use toilet . For subject underwent cranial MRI , least 1 acute infarct diameter ≥2 cm baseline brain diffusionweighted imaging . Key Lacunar isolate brainstem cerebellar stroke base clinical assessment available acute image study perform standard care . Presence acute intracranial hemorrhage acute brain CT MRI . However , petechial hemorrhage ≤1 cm exclusionary . Severe stroke . Seizure onset stroke . Known history prior treatment natalizumab . Known history active viral hepatitis B C. Signs symptom active acute infection . NOTE : Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
